title: Enhance the reveal (second) page with Bengali shayari and a teddy animation

requirements.text: Update the reveal (second) screen to include a dedicated Bengali love shayari section displayed under the existing "You are my Valentine ❤️" headline, with typography and spacing that match the existing dreamy Valentine aesthetic.

quotes: Ei page ta jokhon khulbe ekta rose animation hobe r kichu prem er shayari bengi te lekha thakbe r page ta esthetic hobe

acceptanceCriteria: On the reveal screen, a clearly readable shayari block appears below the main headline.
The shayari block uses Bengali script text (Bangla) and is visually consistent with the current romantic/glassmorphic styling (soft shadows, no harsh contrast).
The shayari text is responsive (does not overflow on small screens) and remains legible over the background and animations.

requirements.text: Add a teddy animation element to the reveal (second) screen and position it harmoniously with the existing reveal content (headline, subtext, and decorations) without obstructing readability or interactions.

quotes: r ha ekta tedy animation o thakbe

acceptanceCriteria: A teddy visual/animation is visible on the reveal screen.
The teddy animation is gentle (e.g., sway/bounce) and does not distract from or cover the main text.
The teddy element is responsive and looks good on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Ensure the rose/petal animation on the reveal (second) screen has a noticeable "page open" moment (an initial burst or stronger start) when the reveal screen becomes visible, while keeping the continuous gentle falling behavior afterward.

quotes: Ei page ta jokhon khulbe ekta rose animation hobe

acceptanceCriteria: When transitioning into the reveal screen, the rose/petal animation feels like it starts/celebrates the reveal (e.g., brief increased spawn density for the first seconds), then returns to the existing continuous gentle falling behavior.
The petal animation layer still does not block interactions (pointer-events disabled).
No performance issues or runaway intervals/animation frames occur after repeated page refreshes.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be edited.
Keep the app as a single-page two-state flow (intro gate -> reveal) with the existing smooth transition behavior.
Do not add new backend functionality; backend/main.mo should remain effectively unused unless explicitly required by a new feature.
nonGoals: Adding additional pages/routes beyond the existing intro and reveal screens.
Adding authentication changes or any Internet Identity flow changes.
Adding external services, databases, or real-time features.
